hive_lesson.title: 1118 His Dreams
hive_lesson.description: Warren talks about his hopes and dreams.

hive_text_custom.text: : Good. I thought today we could talk about childhood dreams. When you were ten years old, what did you want to be when you grew up?

: Right. Well actually it's a little embarrassing. I wanted to be a truck driver. I thought it would be really neat because you can just travel around everywhere and see different places all the time and you're always
. But you know I didn't become a truck driver.
: No, you didn't become a truck driver. Why is that? When did your dream change?
: Well probably when I was around fifteen I thought it would be a lot cooler to be a rock star.

: Yeah, a rock star. I really liked electric guitar at the time and a lot of friends were into music as well so I didn't actually start a band but I played with a lot of different people and sometimes I would play with some bands but I never really
. But I did keep playing guitar and I ended up getting pretty good.
: What kind of rock star did you want to be? Did you want to be like a heavy metal rock star or a grunge rock star?
would be the word. I liked playing a lot of heavy stuff and maybe some folk music as well, so kind of
: So maybe a hippie rock star?
: So then when you were twenty, did you still want to be a rock star?
: No I didn't but I still played guitar then. I actually wanted to be a classical guitarist by then.

: Well it's funny you say that because it's not just classical music. Classical guitar is, for one thing it's the type of guitar. It has nylon strings, not the steel strings like you see on a folk guitar.
: And there's different styles you can play on it like Spanish music, or flamenco, or South American music, some classical music like Beethoven and things like that, or baroque music like Bach.
: Does it have a singer with it?
: Sometimes there are singers. Usually it's solo but you can play some
with other instruments as well and yes I played some pieces with vocalists but it wouldn't be pop music.
: And so now you're older, did your dream come true? Did you become a classical guitarist?
: I did but I actually decided to change my dream after I become a classical guitarist.
: Well my dream now is to become a university professor.
: Oh, and are you making steps to achieve that dream?

: I am actually. I'm working at a university now, not as a professor, as a part time lecturer but I'm taking some courses and studying hard and hoping that my future will allow me to become a professor.
: OK, well unless you change your dream again, I bet you'll achieve your dream so good luck.

answers: a) He wanted to move around a lot.
b) He thought traveling would be fun.
d) His father is a truck driver.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 1) Why did Warren want to become a truck driver?

answers: a) He started a popular band.
d) He played music with many friends.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 2) What did Warren do to become a rock star?

answers: b) One that played many types of music.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 3) What kind of rock star did Warren want to be?
4) What can you play on classical guitar?

answers: c) He is teaching free English lessons.
d) He's studying for an exam.
hive_lesson_quiz.question: 5) What is Warren doing to become a professor?

hive_text_custom.text: Years of experience have made him a
Not too many young people enjoy
but never seems to get tired.
his profession more out of necessity rather than choice.
